title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.3 - Organizational responsibility for implementation of volunteer services program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.3 - Organizational responsibility for implementation of volunteer services program

State Regulations

For the purpose of supervising and coordinating the
volunteer services program, each group IV and group III district shall employ a
full-time or part-time coordinator of volunteer services; and each group I and
group II district shall either employ a full-time or a part-time coordinator of
volunteer services or assign a staff person, of supervisory status, to the
volunteer program. If a group I or group II district shares a volunteer
services program with such a contiguous district, they may jointly appoint a
full-time coordinator of volunteer services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
464.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
